system.summary: Tend to a plant, ensuring it remains healthy and continues to grow.

description.value:
As a Rest Action, you can treat up to a 10 ft area worth of plants, watering and trimming them, and keeping their soil clean and pest-free. This process uses up a pint of water per 5 ft area.
If used on a plant creature, it restores 1d6 additional hit points as part of the rest, but uses up 4 pints of water.
